title: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryDiagonalTrussConnector
description: Shape properties specific to connecting accessories in truss form with diagonal cross-bars.

DiagonalTrussHeight.title: DiagonalTrussHeight
DiagonalTrussHeight.description: The overall height of the truss connector.

DiagonalTrussLength.title: DiagonalTrussLength
DiagonalTrussLength.description: The overall length of the truss connector.

DiagonalTrussCrossBarSpacing.title: DiagonalTrussCrossBarSpacing
DiagonalTrussCrossBarSpacing.description: The spacing between diagonal cross-bar sections.

DiagonalTrussBaseBarDiameter.title: DiagonalTrussBaseBarDiameter
DiagonalTrussBaseBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the base bar.

DiagonalTrussSecondaryBarDiameter.title: DiagonalTrussSecondaryBarDiameter
DiagonalTrussSecondaryBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the secondary bar.

DiagonalTrussCrossBarDiameter.title: DiagonalTrussCrossBarDiameter
DiagonalTrussCrossBarDiameter.description: The nominal diameter of the diagonal cross-bars.
